related_questions.question:
There____some cute cats on the sofa a. Am b. is c. are d. does
secepatnya ya​

answers.answer:
there are some cute cats on the sofa

Penjelasan:

c) are

====================================

C. Are

Pembahasan

Untuk benda yang hanya ada 1 atau tunggal kita menggunakan "There is" , Sedangkan benda yang lebih dari 1 atau jamak maka kita menggunakan "There are".

Maka di pertanyaan tersebut kita menggunakan "There are". Karena ada beberapa hewan atau pada teks tersebut dijelaskan "some cute cats on the sofa" yang artinya beberapa kucing lucu di sofa.

====================================

related_questions.question:
My mom buys some oranges.... are very    sour.the appropriate pronun is....
A.it B.they C.we D.he​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

They

Penjelasan:

Oranges are plural therefore you use the pronoun 'they'

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

maaf kalo salah

Jawaban:

1. B

2. C

3. C

4. C

5. D

6. A

7. B
